detaileddescription.para: Purpose: Copy Constructor. The copy constructor makes the copy of the CIccProfile object in it's present state. It DOES NOT make a copy of the m_pAttachIO member variable. Any operation with the IO object should be done before making a copy.
Args: Profile = CIccProfile object which is to be copied.
Contains: Header for implementation of the IIccProfileConnectionConditions interface class.
